Package com.poli.programmingparadigms.mastermindinenglish.domain.model

Class CardBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poli.programmingparadigms.mastermindinenglish.domain.model.CardBoard
  • public class CardBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the game board for the memory game.

    • Method Detail

      • isCompleted

        public boolean isCompleted()
        Checks if the game board is completed.
        Returns:
        True if the game board is completed, false otherwise.

      • turnCard

        public void turnCard​(int index)
              throws GameOverException,
                     java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Turns over a card on the game board.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the card to be turned over.
        Throws:
        GameOverException - If the maximum failed attempts are reached.
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index is out of bounds.

      • validateGameStatus

        private void validateGameStatus()
        Validates the game status based on the number of pairs successfully matched. If all pairs are matched, sets the 'completed' flag to true.

      • getTotalPairs

        private int getTotalPairs()
        Retrieves the total number of pairs on the game board.
        Returns:
        The total number of pairs.

      • countFailedAttemp

        private void countFailedAttemp()
                        throws GameOverException
        Increments the count of failed attempts and throws a GameOverException if the maximum failed attempts are reached.
        Throws:
        GameOverException - If the maximum failed attempts are reached.
